entry.value:
#/bin/bash
set -o xtrace export RD_URL=http://localhost:4440 export RD_USER=admin export RD_PASSWORD=admin export RD_HTTP_TIMEOUT=3000 export rd_project="$RD_OPTION_PROJECT" export team_suffix="\b$RD_OPTION_CONTAINS\b" export TERM=xterm-mono
if [ "$(/home/rundeck/rd-1.1.7/bin/rd jobs list -p $rd_project | grep "$team_suffix" | wc -l)" -eq 0 ] then echo 'no rundeck jobs to delete'; else for job_id in $(/home/rundeck/rd-1.1.7/bin/rd jobs list -p $rd_project | grep "$team_suffix" | awk '{print $1}' | grep -v "#") do /home/rundeck/rd-1.1.7/bin/rd jobs disable -i "$job_id" done
while true do for execution_id in $(/home/rundeck/rd-1.1.7/bin/rd executions list -p "$rd_project" | awk '{print $1}' | grep -v "#") do if [ -z "$execution_id" ] then break else /home/rundeck/rd-1.1.7/bin/rd executions kill -e "$execution_id" fi done done fi
